remarks: The previous definition of function value, from before the ` iota ` operator was introduced.  Although based on the idea embodied by Definition 10.2 of [Quine] p. 65 (see ~ args ), this definition apparently does not appear in the literature.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Aug-1994.)
statement:
dffv4g $p |- ( A e. V -> ( F ` A ) = U. { x | ( F " { A } ) = { x } } ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
$d V x $.
